entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
